name: vivo X200T
highlights:
Not announced yet
203g or 205g, 8mm thickness
Android 16, up to 5 major Android upgrades
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, glass back or fiber-reinforced plastic back
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

PLATFORM.OS: Android 16, up to 5 major Android upgrades
PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.63 GHz Cortex-X925 & 3x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 4x2.4 GHz Cortex-A720)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.6, 23mm (wide), 1/1.56", PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.6, 70mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.95", PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.0, 15mm, 119˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.76", 0.64µm, AF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Laser AF, Zeiss optics, Zeiss T* lens coating, LED flash, panorama, HDR, 3D LUT import

COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5)

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
